title: GMFB: To The Summit
itunes:title: GMFB: To The Summit
description:
On the #GMFB podcast: Kyle discusses his Eddie Lacy-inspired weight loss incentive (1:05); The team discusses the concept of players and weight loss (7:27); The team shares their experiences at the NFL Network Summit (12:08); Kyle recalls asking about celebration dunks (18:39); Peter wonders if legal celebrations may decrease the likelihood of them happening (22:35); The team discusses meeting Will Selva in person (27:55); Peter on his interesting wardrobe change experience (28:35); Kyle shares his awkward handshake experience with Snoop Dog (32:02); and finally, the idea of players watching football-based shows about themselves in the locker room (36:14)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
